Seyom Advantage: The AnAT framework for Transformation

Seyom is a transformation partner that helps organizations achieve their goals by leveraging the AnAT framework. AnAT stands for Analytics, Automation, and Transformation. We believe that the best way to achieve transformation is to leverage the power of data and automation to drive transformation. We have a proven track record of helping organizations achieve their goals by leveraging the AnAT framework.

Use Cases

  • Performed structured data analytics across major verticals for our client and defined clear KPIs for each module.
  • Helped drive performance improvements through root cause analysis of low margin products
  • Enabled structured use of inventory and other manufacturing data enabling to help with better decision making
